summary:
Adds 30+ enchantments to the game including 12 unique, legendary enchantments. Also adds a post-endgame dungeon where the 12 unique enchantments can be found!

But can you beat the bosses and take their power as well as potentially a lifetime worth of riches?
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6CPSO.jpg[/IMG]

This file is (finally) obsolete! The new and complete version is here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42500/

You will not be able to keep both mods active, and shouldn\'t have to as Spellblade is the finished version of Way of the Spellblade.

Give it a look as it is a massive amount of content compared to this mod.
author: Shinokage
